name: Collapse (itch) (atacanbulunmaz)
description:
The Collapse game 2021 is new adaptive endless ball runner game. Stay on the path and try not to fall while zoping as you can. The ball speed is adaptive to your game. Your score increases as long as you stay on path.

How to play - Collapese 2021
Tap or click to change direction of the ball and roll across the path. Make sure to keep your balance and not fall off from the road. Keep your fingers steady and improve your concentration with the free rolling ball game! Create a high score and challenge yourself in the free rolling ball game!
